title: Valid Parentheses
problemDescription: Given a string s containing just the characters '(', ')', '{', '}', '[' and ']', determine if the input string is valid. An input string is valid if: (1) Open brackets must be closed by the same type of brackets, (2) Open brackets must be closed in the correct order, (3) Every close bracket has a corresponding open bracket of the same type.
